title: g
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The <g> SVG element is a container used to group other SVG elements.

usageExamples.title: Grouping SVG Elements
usageExamples.description: Example of using the <g> element to group multiple SVG elements together.
usageExamples.code:
<svg>
  <g>
    <circle cx='50' cy='50' r='40' fill='red' />
    <rect x='10' y='10' width='80' height='80' fill='blue' />
  </g>
</svg>
